roleset.name: to withdraw from an organization or communion
roleset.note: SECEDE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'secede' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from secede.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: automatically generated
example.text: The Bougainville copper mine has been inoperative since May 15 because of attacks by native landowners who [*T*-1] want Bougainville to secede from Papua-New Guinea .
